CustomField.formula: IF( (RecordType.Name="RCI") && ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c,"Approved") && (LC_Approval_Required_By__c >= Approval_Date__c), "Yes", IF( (RecordType.Name="RCI") && ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c,"Approved") && (LC_Approval_Required_By__c < Approval_Date__c), "No", null))
CustomField.label: Approval Date Met
